Breadth-First.Explanation: Broad initial observation and general clue collection (identifying German plaque and ‘ELBTUNNEL’).
Listing all text details from the plaque without yet forming or verifying a location hypothesis.

Depth-First.Explanation: Based on the ‘ELBTUNNEL’ clue, the model formulates and states the hypothesis that this is Hamburg’s Elbe Tunnel.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Identification of Elbe Tunnel in Hamburg

Depth-First.Explanation: Verification by matching construction dates, technical specs, and German terminology to the historic Elbe Tunnel.
Depth-First.KeyElement: List of confirming clues (name, dates, length, elevators, safety plate)

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent confirmation using architectural style and neighborhood context to pinpoint St. Pauli in Hamburg.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Architecture and location context (St. Pauli, Landungsbrücken)

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Attention shifts from broad transcription of plaque text to hypothesis confirmation and detailed location identification.
